urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
content:
From 18 May 2020 there will be changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work will move from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps will be built to connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17

urlText: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed
content:
From Saturday 25 July to Sunday 13 September, the Suburban Tunnel at Central Station will be temporarily closed due to Sydney Metro works.

To access Platforms 16 to 23 please follow signs and use the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel.

Central Station map
subtitle: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed

urlText: Fairy Meadow Station ramp access temporarily unavailable
content:
From Monday 10 August for approximately 6 weeks, there will be ‘stair access only’ to/from platform 1 at Fairy Meadow Station due to station upgrade works. Ramp access will not be available during this time.

Construction includes the building of new ramps and link bridges.

If you require ramp access you will be need to make alternative arrangements. 

For assistance please call Fairy Meadow Station on 02 4223 5582.
subtitle: Fairy Meadow Station ramp access temporarily unavailable
